overview: Erik Rhodes blasts another hit outta the park with Crotch Rocket. Be it riding a revved-up motorbike or better yet, another man, nothing beats the feeling of rolling thunder throbbing between your thighs. So join our cast of nine as they hop on their personalized Crotch Rockets to speed off on new and exciting adventures that quickly exceeds all their wild expectations.
title: Crotch Rocket
